EmailTemplate.name: Global_Content Syndication_OperationalizingDataScience_WP_Q117.Download Confirma
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for downloading the Operationalizing Data Science white paper
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading the white paper, The Last Mile: Operationalizing Data Science <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/the-last-mile-operationalizing-data-science]]>. We hope you found it informative and helpful.
Given your interest in this report, we thought you might also find these resources of interest:
- Article: Data Science 101: Take A Data-Driven Approach to Business <[[https://pivotal.io/data-science]]>
- Webinar Replay: Using Data Science for Cybersecurity <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/using-data-science-for-cybersecurity]]>
- Infographic: Building Data-Driven IoT Applications <[[https://content.pivotal.io/infographics/building-data-driven-iot-applications]]>
- White Paper: The Data Warehouse in the Age of Digital Transformation <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/the-data-warehouse-in-the-age-of-digital-transformation-white-paper]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks/shaping-the-future-of-data-warehousing-through-open-source-software]]>
- Technical Article: Continuous Integration for Data Science <[[http://engineering.pivotal.io/post/continuous-integration-for-data-science/]]>
- eBook: Shaping the Future of Data Warehousing through Open Source Software <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks/shaping-the-future-of-data-warehousing-through-open-source-software]]>
- Video: Data Microservices in the Cloud <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H-T-0WdZ3Sk&list=PLAdzTan_eSPQ1fuLSBhyB4eEZF7JQM0Mx&index=175]]>
- Analyst Report: Spring Cloud Data Flow for Continuous Data Processing <[[https://content.pivotal.io/analyst-reports/spring-cloud-data-flow-for-continuous-data-processing]]>
If you would like more information, or have any questions about how Pivotal can assist your organization on its digital transformation journey, don’t hesitate to reach out by contacting us here <[[https://pivotal.io/contact]]>. Thank you, The Pivotal Team
